Course templates

How to use: Click "Download" to save the template file, or "View" to preview it in your browser. Copy the contents into your own project and customize as needed.

Template for creating project instruction files that guide Claude Code. Include project overview, structure, commands, and style guidelines.

Sections: overview, structure, commands, style guide, notes
